评论概述: dress fits well- fabric inconsistent between colors
评论详情: I purchased 3 different dresses in this style.  One- black, one black islet, one white with flowers.  All 3 were size medium (I am 5'6'' 155)  They were all very different fabric.  The islet fit best, but is intended to be a cover up, (which I neglected to read before purchasing) so I returned it.  The white was thinnest and lightest fabric, which was not great when wearing anything underneath as it's see through.  The black had just one pocket and only on the left- which was unusual.  It also had the thickest fabric.  It was more like a heavy tshirt so it doesn't lay the same as the other two fabrics.  It does hide the lumps and bumps, but I'm a little concerned about how it will wash.  Overall- the syle is great, and fits well under the armpits so no peak a boo bra.
Cute material. Has pockets. But too sizes too big and much longer than I expected

This dress has a different pattern than what the model is wearing. The neckline is different enough that it loses the little bit of sundress-type strap feel, and the stress goes pretty straight down like an oversized tshirt as opposed to a dress that swings when you walk. It's an OK dress for what it is, but it's a big disappointment compared to the way it is advertised, and as I don't find the shape flattering, I would not order this dress again.

This is a really cute dress, and it's great to wear by itself or as a bikini coverup. The material is a stretchy jersey type fabric, i think it's a poly/rayon blend, but it feels like cotton. It's rather thin and breathes well, making it a great dress for summer and the beach especially. The fit is true to size and the cut is slightly generous, so it's a great choice for any body type. Stitching is fine, seams are even and there are no flaws i can see. My only complaint is the dress is a lot shorter than pictured. I get it, we all don't have the same body types-- proportions are different and all that-- but this dress comes up pretty high on my thigh and my body isn't THAT different than the model's. I wound up having to add a little bit of fabric to the shoulder straps to lower the dress a bit. But hey, if the hardest decision of my day is, do i wanna show more cleavage or more thigh... it's not a bad day.

Wore this in Aruba on vacation and a sweet stranger (male) stopped me in a restaurant to tell me I looked beautiful. Must have been the dress! It's colorful, fits nicely, great length. Kind of dress that can be daytime with flip flops or out to dinner with nice sandals and some jewelry.

评论概述: The cut is a little too low
评论详情: When I have it on, it goes a little bit lower on my chest than I’d like it to. The middle section fits nicely, and the length is perfect. (Just above my knee)  I love the pockets in the front as well. Most dresses have the pockets at your hips, kind of adding a weird lumpy look.
It is soft and comfortable.  I live in a very humid climate.  This dress is my new favorite

I bought a couple of these dresses in medium. Perfect fit, love the pockets, and the fabric is cool for summer but not see-through. Just the right amount of flow, not too baggy. Machine washed and line dried.

I received  several compliments when I've been out wearing it. I am planning a trip to Tahiti next spring and I plan to take it and probably a few more with different patterns. i have washed the dress twice and so far I do not see any fading of the colors. I'm rather tall, 5' 11, and about 150 lbs and the XL size is perfect for me. I would say that if you get the right size you will be very happy with this dress.
